Detailed Description

Pseudo-random generation of poisson distributed deviates.

For details about this distribution, see Wikipedia - Poisson distribution.

For details of the algorithm, see Communication Networks Class Library (TU München)

pdf: f(x) = exp(-l)*l^x/x!; l = lambda
